lu.uni.lassy.excalibur.examples.icrash.dev.java.environment.actors

Interface ActProxyComCompany

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JIntIsActor, java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActProxyComCompanyImpl

    public interface ActProxyComCompany
extends java.rmi.Remote, JIntIsActor
    The Interface ActProxyComCompany that allows RMI access to the proxy actor on the client side.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getName()
      Gets the name of the communication company assigned to this actor.
      PtBoolean ieSmsSend(DtPhoneNumber aDtPhoneNumber, DtSMS aDtSMS)
      Recieves a message from the server side actor with details of if the alert was logged or not.
      PtBoolean oeAlert(EtHumanKind aEtHumanKind, DtDate aDtDate, DtTime aDtTime, DtPhoneNumber aDtPhoneNumber, DtGPSLocation aDtGPSLocation, DtComment aDtComment)
      Contacts the server actor and initiates an alert creation.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Gets the name of the communication company assigned to this actor.
        Returns:
        The name of the communication company assigned to this actor
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if the server is offline

      • oeAlert

        PtBoolean oeAlert(EtHumanKind aEtHumanKind,
                  DtDate aDtDate,
                  DtTime aDtTime,
                  DtPhoneNumber aDtPhoneNumber,
                  DtGPSLocation aDtGPSLocation,
                  DtComment aDtComment)
           throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                  java.rmi.NotBoundException
        Contacts the server actor and initiates an alert creation.
        Parameters:
        aEtHumanKind - The type of human reporting the accident
        aDtDate - The date of the accident
        aDtTime - The time of the accident
        aDtPhoneNumber - The phone number of the human associated with the accident
        aDtGPSLocation - The location of the accident
        aDtComment - The message sent by the human associated with the accident
        Returns:
        The success of the method
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if the server is offline
        java.rmi.NotBoundException - Thrown if the server is not bound correctly in RMI settings

      • ieSmsSend

        PtBoolean ieSmsSend(DtPhoneNumber aDtPhoneNumber,
                    DtSMS aDtSMS)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Recieves a message from the server side actor with details of if the alert was logged or not.
        Parameters:
        aDtPhoneNumber - The phone number of the human associated with the accident
        aDtSMS - The message sent to the human
        Returns:
        The success of the method
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if the server is offline
